result.name: jobcentre_plus_pathways_to_work_official_statistics
result.notes:
Quarterly statistics on the number of programme starts and job entries for Jobcentre Plus Pathways to Work.  Includes data on elements of Choices. Pathways to Work ceased to operate on 31st March 2011.  As such, the last JCP and Provider-Led Pathways Official Statistics publications will be released on 25th October 2011.  These publications will show total starts and job entries upto the end of the programme.

https://webarchive.nationalarchives.gov.uk/+/http://research.dwp.gov.uk/asd/workingage/p2w_jc.asp

https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/provider-led-pathways-to-work-number-of-starts

Source agency: Work and Pensions

Designation: Official Statistics not designated as National Statistics

Language: English

Alternative title: JCP Pathways

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Jobcentre Plus Pathways to Work Official Statistics
